channel.title: [CLASS SUGGESTION] The Widow
channel.description:
**THE WIDOW**
* Neutral Faction - Social?
* Passive [-] Veil of Tears - The Widow wears a Black Veil, Which gives her immunity to detection (?)
* Day Ability [-] Crying Embrace - The Widow Embraces Someone, Temporarily Showing their role to everyone, EX: Widow Embraces *PERSON* Their Role is *THis* (Text is gone after 5 seconds, Limited uses 3)
* Night Ability [-] Cry Of Detection - The Widow Cries at someones house, Learning their Role Type, And Faction. (Limited Use 5 or infinite) If this is Two OP, Please tell me how to fix it
